document_data.mainbody:
Badiyah al-Said al-Sahim was an elf and a skilled flame mage living in the Free City of Qadib in north Zakhara in .
In addition to running the University of Flame Mages, Badiyah was also a member of the Sultans court.
Badiyah was rumored to be a secret member of the Brotherhood of the True Flame.
